data.lyric:
[ti:State Of Grace (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]State Of Grace (Taylor’s Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:12.47]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift
[00:24.95]Composed by：Taylor Swift
[00:37.42]I'm walking fast through the traffic lights
[00:40.80]
[00:41.31]Busy streets and busy lives
[00:44.06]And all we know is touch and go
[00:51.32]
[00:52.13]We are alone with our changing minds
[00:55.85]We fall in love 'til it hurts or bleeds
[00:58.87]Or fades in time
[01:02.95]
[01:06.03]And I never
[01:08.59]Never
[01:10.45]Saw you coming
[01:17.95]
[01:20.91]And I'll never
[01:23.31]Never
[01:25.13]Be the same
[01:31.40]
[01:51.24]You come around and the armor falls
[01:54.98]Pierce the room like a cannonball
[01:57.97]Now all we know is don't let go
[02:05.36]
[02:05.93]We are alone just you and me
[02:09.72]Up in your room and our slates are clean
[02:12.68]Just twin fire signs four blue eyes
[02:20.07]
[02:20.75]So you were never a saint
[02:22.46]And I loved in shades of wrong
[02:24.43]We learn to live with the pain
[02:26.27]Mosaic broken hearts
[02:28.13]But this love is brave and wild
[02:34.54]And I never
[02:37.08]Never
[02:39.00]Saw you coming
[02:46.33]
[02:49.40]And I'll never
[02:51.93]Never
[02:53.75]Be the same
[03:02.36]
[03:03.16]This is a state of grace
[03:07.06]This is the worthwhile fight
[03:10.59]Love is a ruthless game
[03:13.63]Unless you play it good and right
[03:18.06]These are the hands of fate
[03:21.59]You're my Achilles heel
[03:25.42]This is the golden age
[03:27.43]Of something good and right and real
[03:33.74]And I never
[03:36.19]Never
[03:38.06]Saw you coming
[03:45.87]
[03:48.58]And I'll never
[03:52.80]Be the same
[04:03.34]And I never
[04:05.74]Never
[04:07.58]Saw you coming
[04:14.94]
[04:18.02]And I'll never
[04:18.90]So you were never a saint
[04:20.81]And I loved in shades of wrong
[04:22.50]Be the same
[04:23.34]We learn to live with the pain
[04:24.69]Mosaic broken hearts
[04:26.48]But this love is brave and wild
[04:32.14]This is a state of grace
[04:35.69]This is the worthwhile fight
[04:38.89]
[04:39.40]Love is a ruthless game
[04:42.43]Unless you play it good and right
data.trans:
[ti:State Of Grace (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:12.47]//
[00:24.94]//
[00:37.42]快步穿梭于变幻的红绿灯间
[00:40.80]
[00:41.31]喧闹的街角 忙碌的生活
[00:44.06]我们只知道擦肩而过
[00:51.32]
[00:52.13]孤身一人 思绪不停变化
[00:55.85]我们坠入爱河 直至受伤流血 
[00:58.87]或直到时间慢慢抹去爱的印记
[01:02.95]
[01:06.03]而我不曾预见
[01:08.59]不曾预见
[01:10.45]与你遇见
[01:17.95]
[01:20.91]我的世界
[01:23.31]就会
[01:25.13]从此改变
[01:31.40]
[01:51.24]你的出现 使防备逐步卸下
[01:54.98]强有力的击碎坚硬的围墙
[01:57.97]彼此都知道 你和我在这场戏 绝不能退出
[02:05.36]
[02:05.93]孤男寡女
[02:09.72]共处你室 相安无事
[02:12.68]只有同是火象星座的两人眼神湛蓝 四目对视
[02:20.07]
[02:20.75]你就是个玩爱之徒
[02:22.46]我一直在错误的氛围中爱着
[02:24.43]我们学会忍受伤痛
[02:26.27]还有那破碎成马赛克般的玻璃心
[02:28.13]但这份爱狂妄不羁
[02:34.54]而我不曾预见
[02:37.08]不曾预见
[02:39.00]与你遇见
[02:46.33]
[02:49.40]我的世界
[02:51.93]就会
[02:53.75]从此改变
[03:02.36]
[03:03.16]这是上天赐予的恩泽
[03:07.06]值得为此走钢索
[03:10.59]爱情就是野蛮游戏
[03:13.63]除非伪善的脸 老虎老鼠你能分辨
[03:18.06]命运向我们伸出双手
[03:21.59]你是我致命的要害
[03:25.42]在最美的年华里遇见你 
[03:27.43]如此真切
[03:33.74]而我不曾预见
[03:36.19]不曾预见
[03:38.06]与你遇见
[03:45.87]
[03:48.58]我的世界
[03:52.80]从此改变
[04:03.34]而我不曾预见
[04:05.74]不曾预见
[04:07.58]与你遇见
[04:14.94]
[04:18.02]我的世界
[04:18.90]你就是个玩爱之徒
[04:20.81]我一直在错误的氛围中爱着
[04:22.50]从此改变
[04:23.34]我们学会忍受伤痛
[04:24.69]还有那破碎成马赛克般的玻璃心
[04:26.48]但这份爱狂妄不羁
[04:32.14]这是上天赐予的恩泽
[04:35.69]值得为此走钢索
[04:38.89]
[04:39.40]爱情就是野蛮游戏
[04:42.43]除非伪善的脸 老虎老鼠你能分辨
